body.name: Sweetcrispy Electric Standing Desk - 40 x 24 inch Adjustable Height Sit to Stand Up Desk with Splice Board, Rising Home Office Computer Table with 2 Hook and Wire Hole for Work

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Rustic Brown With Double Drawer & Shelf

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: DUAL SPLIT WIDE DESKTOP - This standing desk is designed with 2 spliced panels to reduce the weight burden when installing, and it also increases the width of the desktop by 40" x 24" to provide more usable space for your desktop!

QUIET AND SMOOTH - This electric standing desk is powered by a powerful motor that smoothly adjusts the height from 28.7" - 48" and ensures a low noise level (less than 50 decibels), so you can rest assured that your pets won't be woken up even if they are sleeping!

ELECTRIC INTELLIGENT CONTROLLER - The sit-to-stand desk features an LED display hand controller with 3 preset height memory buttons, which can be lifted and lowered with a single click for more flexibility and convenience;

STURDY & DURABLE - Home office computer standing desk consists of reinforced stainless steel frame, thickened table top and sturdy T-legs, factory tested for 50,000 lifts and the powerful motor lifts the weight up to 176 lbs for two monitors + laptop and more.

EASY INSTALLATION - We provide an installation video and installation manual in every electric home office standing desk package. Detailed installation instructions and a full set of accessories allow you to quickly assemble the desk in less than 30 minutes;

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page Electric Standing Desk for Home Office
Adjustable Height Sit to Stand Up Desk with Splice Board
Smooth And Quiet Electric Standing Desk Anti-collision technology better guards the health of your furniture!
Previous page Next page 1 2 * Spliced Boards 2 Smart Control 3 Friendly Desktop

Does the stand-up desk with double drawers come in a box with tools to assemble the upright desk? All standing desk boxes include the tools needed for installation, and you can follow the installation video or installation manual to quickly complete the installation in less than 30 minutes! What is the drawer width and writing space of the adjustable desk with storage? The desktop size of our two drawer standing desk is 24*40, 24*48" and 24*55", 24*63, the drawer size is 11.81IN x 3.94IN x 10.63IN, the two drawer storage and heightened shelves are fully able to satisfy your work and study needs. If the motor (or power supply) of the sit-to-stand desk fails, is there a manual function? Not that I know of, you need to wait for power to be restored before you can adjust the height! What is the adjustable height and maximum load capacity of this standing table? The adjustable height range of this electric stand up desk is 28.7"-48" and the maximum weight capacity is 176 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Revolutionize Your Workspace: Standing Desk - Affordable, Stylish, and Whisper-Quiet!
reviews.reviewText: This standing desk has proven to be a smart buy with its fair pricing, easy installation, and attractive design that enhances any workspace. The secure packaging ensures it arrives in pristine condition, and its quiet operation makes height adjustments seamless without causing disruptions. Ideal for those trying standing desks for the first time, it provides a positive and accessible introduction to this ergonomic solution. While I'm uncertain about its long-term durability, its current sturdiness and construction quality inspire confidence in its reliability. The desk not only encourages healthy habits by promoting better posture but also offers versatile adjustability to cater to various working positions. It's particularly well-suited for beginners, making it a valuable addition to any office or home setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were not great, but I was able to put this desk together in less than an hour. And I’m not great at putting things together. It’s sturdy and works really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cost effective standing desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk is a great value. It is easy to assemble, it took about 45 minutes and needed just a philips head screwdriver. The instructions were clear, and there were even 'extra' fasteners included, and clearly labled. None were needed, the counts in all of the bags were correct and I didn't loose any :-) This is not a finely crafted piece of heirloom furniture, the desktop itself is a composite with a woodgrain print on it that look fine, and should be quite durable. The height adjustment mechanism works smoothly and quietly. All in all, this is a very low cost, but highly functional standing desk if you have a small working space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: Unbeatable for the price. I purchased this standing desk since I work from home and live in a pretty small apartment (<600 sq feet) So I needed something that would fit easily in my bedroom but still had enough room for both my large monitor and laptop. It was easy to put together and only took an hour or two. Does get a tad wobbly, if at full standing height, but to be expected for the price and nothing that noticeable. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you WFH - BUY THIS!!!
reviews.reviewText: Best decision I’ve ever made buying a piece of furniture. I WFH 5 days a week and sitting started hurting my hips and back - this desk raises SO tall for those who need that extra height. It glides smooth and assembly was so simple - a caveman could do it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this standing desk
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk for my home office, and I love it! It was a little hard to put together by myself, but I got the job done and I'm very happy. I recommend having someone help you if possible, but if not, you'll be ok. I like the look of it, and the buttons make it so easy to use. I also like that you can select settings; I have one for sitting, one for standing, and another for standing with a treadmill. I do wish it had a little more storage, but overall, this is a 5/5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good desk, ticking sound when goes up, seller requires credit card to give replacement parts
reviews.reviewText: Weird situation where the bar that rotates to lift the desk was ticking on the way up. I talked to the owner of the company who insisted that company policy means that he needs my credit card to issue a temporary credit before sending out any warranty repairs so if I decided not to keep the desk he would refund it? Rather than doing through Amazon? Very confusing.Minus 1 star for ticking and 1 for the weird company policy. But I'm keeping the desk because it's a pain to assemble and its sturdy enough

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good table for either standing or sitting.
reviews.reviewText: Like: Height adjustment very smooth. Desk is very well builtDislike: Table top is a wood composite material. Having a center drawer would be great
